item.guild.profession_licence.descriptio: Grants access to quests of the profession.
Use while sneaking to abandon the profession.
item.guild.profession_licence.licence.su: Congratulations! You can now accept quests of the %s profession
item.guild.profession_licence.licence.fa: You already are a member of the %s profession
item.guild.profession_licence.resignment: You are not currently a member of the %s profession
profession.missing:
You need a profession before opening the Guild screen.
Go visit the Guild Master!
screen.guild.quests.build.description: Place the specified blocks to build a structure.
screen.guild.quests.deliver_item.descrip: Obtain the requested item to progress with the quest.
Items will get automatically delivered on quest completition.
screen.guild.quests.slay.description: Slay the requested entity to progress with the quest.
screen.guild.quests.time_available.descr: Complete a quest within its available time to get the full reward.
Expired quests can still be completed but with a lesser reward.
Use the Luck effect to get a bonus roll on the lesser reward.
